title: 【Bits & Bops】海外で噂の軽快なリズムゲーム！…この感じ知ってる！？！？？【ホロライブ/白上フブキ】
name: Shirakami Fubuki

entries.text: I've never really worked a normal job in society,
but I hear Show Biz is absolute heaven.
It was heaven! A birthday is sure to be fun!
So let's get right into it! Heave-ho!
Dog? Cat? Chicken? Is this a chicken?
Well, let's dare to go with Cat.
It really looks like it, doesn't it?
Before we start the game, can you tell me a little about yourself?
Do you prefer getting hints or thinking for yourself?
Eh, I want to think for myself.
I can see that aura of independence right away.
Anyway, now that we're officially acquainted,
let's move on to the video.
We're a little different from your average record store,
so there are some things you should know before entering.
First, about the device you're using.
Let's see, what are you using? Eh?
I'm playing with a controller today.
Most game controllers work just by plugging them in,
In Bits & Bops, you use buttons 1 and 2.
Pop'n Music has way more, you know!
you can always change it in the video settings.
you can even do it with 1 button.
I'll play a metronome, so wait a sec.
There is only one Golden Rule.
Let's try it out a bit.
On 2 and 3, try to hit it!
It's okay, you'll get used to it soon.
That concludes the check, so do your best!
Rely on your eyes, ears... m-meori... rely on your ears?
Not visually, but matching it by ear, with the sound.
Ah! The Safety Video is over!
Thanks for watching until the end!
From here on, you can freely look around the shop.
Feel free to look around the shop.
and the Lounge is to the left.
We just opened, so sorry there isn't much to see yet.
If there's anything you need, ring that bell.
That's about it? Have a fun time.
Ah, he teaches you... Oh, a bell. *Pon!*
Ah, safe! I just wanted to ring the bell for minigame help.
Ah, it's that kind of thing.
Wait, there's a Sea Lion... ah, on the right.
The seals here love playing catch with balls.
Tap the ball to take a picture.
This kid is great at lifting too! Amazing, right?
When you hear the bell, snap the shutter 3 times in a row.
Watch the ball closely and catch the timing!
You took a picture that'll last a lifetime!
This is totally a God Game.
A parcel has arrived for you.
Opening parcels is easy, so come by.
Come check the counter from time to time.
You might not believe it, but I'm a pirate.
I mean, this place is empty, isn't it?
Wait, is *this* the treasure you meant?
If you find anything that looks like it's worth money, tell me.
Ah, the record will get scratched.
It's a dimension just for me and you.
Don't let your feet get tripped up.
Pay attention to the signal when the tempo drops.
Seems like this is a piece of cake for you now.
I want to aim for Amazing.
I'm curious about the Ant, but...
Let's do the Snail one more time.
OK, just one more, one more.
Ah! The credit goes to you!
But ending with a thumbs up was really good.
It's time to gather food! Yes!
I thought I messed up the line quite a bit,
The guy in front was glaring at me pretty hard though.
It has all the minigame dances
up to this point in it.
Lots of green, like a jungle.
Looks like a place full of vitality.
Wow, those guys are gonna be there?
I actually really liked the Rock-Paper-Scissors Battle song.
Raven! I love Raven! Just a Raven!
Shirogane might not be able to see because of the white hair... wait a sec.
I'm... Ah, wait wait, I went back, I went back.
The title looks like Crayon Shin-chan.
The Game Corner on the right is perfect for when you want to take a break.
The games here work a little differently from the others.
Eh, you can play with friends up to 4 players.
While watching a play, I'll stop explaining from the pause menu.
To get up here... this frog guy... push when everyone's ready. Wave the baton.
A friend recommended this shop so I came to check it out. Heard it just opened.
When a cozy little shop opens, I just can't help but check it out.
Even if it's still empty inside.
The type who wants to see it first.
First, I want to see the reviews.
I tend to think a newly opened place will be crowded,
so I'm the type who checks reviews.
First, let others try it for you,
and hearing their thoughts is good too.
And that "other person" might be me.
Clear the step for a reward.
Let's go to the next one.
Swing arms, clap 3 times, then swing arms 4 times.
When it's this way, do this and spin...
Isn't that nice? Now for the real thing!
Cool! One more time, one more time!
At times like that, just leave it to the flow-chu.
Chuu-gooo! Then let the party begin-chuuu!
The most important thing is tempo!
Now let's try with a bounce ball!
maybe they realized the outside world is nice?
It was a fun-looking bird life.
Lamy and I actually have a skating sponsorship coming up.
First, let's practice some simple steps.
When the beat plays 3 times, move forward 3 steps.
You're okay, you're okay, I'm right beside you.
After that... after that... after that...
At a resort... at a ski resort.
I think you can do even harder steps!
When you hear the bell, do 2 slick steps!
Shirogane can skate, by the way.
Into a friend in front of me.
With that awareness of "I can't stop,"
I guess I became bad at it.
Let's add one more variation to the steps!
This time it's on the off-beat of a 2-beat measure!
Being able to ski is nice.
Probably because they said boarding fits me more.
By the way, I've only done snowboarding once,
but I've never had an accident on a board.
Boarding might have suited Shirogane better.
You just fall backwards if you think it's dangerous.
Legs go *hanya* and you can't move.
My legs were definitely in trouble.
Make sure to do warm-up exercises before you start!
With skiing, Shirogane only has memories
of crashing into a friend and not stopping.
Please teach Shirogane how to ski.
Let's skate while the rink is open!
Keep sliding on the ice forever!
Free and whimsical, full of adventurous spirit...
Feels like you could go anywhere.
You made it back to the ground properly!
It's gonna take time to get new minigames.
It seems it'll take a while.
I messed up, I messed up!
I made mistakes, but glad I got Amazing.
Hi, hello, nice to meet you.
Please don't mind my work coat.
Wait, was it supposed to be your portrait?
But it turned out pretty good, right?
The teddy bear song is so good.
Need weighs heavy... Teamwork is perfect! That's the furthest we've gone yet! Yay!
Let's head back. Seeing how far we can go together is hard, right? Don't worry, you'll get the hang of it soon!
But if you want to advance first, I'll help you out, just ring the bell. I see. Ah.
Only up to here? Maybe... Welcome!
A new minigame could arrive anytime, so play in the Game Corner until then!
If you get stuck, ring the bell, okay?
Are you waiting for an update?
Trouble happens to everyone, after all.
I think that's fine. A delivery just arrived anyway!
Do I have to play the minigame?
I was wandering outside and saw the game.
You play too? What do you do in your free time?
Set things on fire? No way.
I had a feeling that was it.
I want to work at a stall.
If you want to be a top-tier chef,
you gotta be able to throw a skewer or two.
Hold at just the right timing for a continuous throw! Release the button to line up more!
Working at a stall was fun.
Haa haa... When fireworks launch into the night sky,
We always went to see fireworks displays.
We got to see them from pretty great spots.
Welcome to the pointless orientation, Rookie.
Today's lesson is how to use the Rail Trolley.
When you see the odd one out, tap to hit the lever!
Next is using the Emergency Brake.
When I blow the whistle, tap to hit the brake!
We gotta brake at the same time.
Just in time for the lift.
That was a super fun song.
But was the Ant the cutest?
No, but the Firefly just now was cute too...
Seems like a mystery is hidden inside.
The rules might be slightly different.
Do it? What do you mean?
It looks like it'll take time to get the next new minigame.
Why not go back to the Game Corner?
Ah, so it continues like that, I see.
So the BPM is how far you can go.
Maybe this is the last one in the row?
Next up... Now I'm being commanded.
An Orb with a human voice.
Well, if he has the people's support, then fine.
Today's show was a huge success.
Ah, flick the coin into the box.
If you miss any, make sure to pick them up later.
We'll never finish at this rate!
This is a show, after all.
The timing is tricky so listen to the sound!
Ah, reminds me of Berorincho (Rhythm Heaven).
Who said you could be good at this?
Seems you've got the hang of it.
The next one might be a bit tricky.
When you hear the high-pitch beat, it's not a planet!
No, I really love this song though.
Right! Clearing the last Mix Tape is amazing!
I knew you could do it!
That means you've completed all the minigames in your house!
By the way, parcels are really piling up...
I've even made a song about checking parcels.
Wait a minute! One more time!
As expected of the final Mix Tape!
If I can't become an alien...
But I want to do my best.
Does it arrive if I check one?
No matter how much attention I get,
Everyone who came to the show-chu!
What a wonderful thing to say!
You're good at making people happy-chu!
Ah, here it comes! The final minigame!
Sharpness, sense, everything was god-tier play!
You showed incredible skill in every minigame!
And just in the nick of time, because the shop is closing!
Thanks for coming to Bits & Bops!
Looking forward to seeing you again!
Rhythm games are great after all.
and the songs were really good too.
It was just genuinely fun as a rhythm game.
Makes me want more songs though.
I want to go watch Choco-sen's stream,
so I'll end it here for today.
The last one was a bit frustrating,
Or maybe you guys, in place of Shirogane,
